Judge's Sepulcher Manager:
Only a party of 4 characters of Lv. 80 and above can enter the Four Sepulchers, where the emperors of Elmoreden lay. Also you need a Grave Pass.
The Sepulchers had become unstable because of Frtintezza, and when the Halisha's Shadow appeared the things turned to worse. To enter the Unstable Sepulcher each character must have 3 Grave Passes. Dangerous monsters dwell there, so not everyone is allowed to enter.
